title: Parallel Education Model
desc: Our Parallel Education Model delivers teaching and learning in a way that recognises the unique and changing social, emotional and educational needs of all students.

title: Community Focused
desc: All  schools under BFI are above all an integrated and passionate community of students, teachers, parents, guardians and alumni, working together to ensure BFI remains a supportive and enriching environment in which to learn and socialise.

title: Explicit Teaching Model
desc: Our innovative Explicit Teaching Model provides the best possible start for all BFI Junior School students, helping them engage with and master the core skills of Literacy and Numeracy.

title: Academic success
desc: BFI Education Services is acclaimed as a great Company because of its schools` outstanding academic results and a unique combination of factors that deliver more than the sum of their parts.
